Want to learn more about BMA events and exhibitions? Sign up to receive our weekly newsletter. We'll see you at the Museum soon!

Open Late on Thursdays

Enjoy more time with art—we are now open late on Thursdays for evening visits!

Whether you want to unwind after work, create a unique date night, or find a quiet moment of inspiration, we hope our new hours offer more flexibility to enjoy the art you love. 

Tuesdays: 1–5pm
Wednesdays: 10am–5pm
Thursdays: 10am–8pm
Fridays:  10am–5pm
Saturdays: 10am–5pm
Sundays: 12–5pm
